publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-407 Robert Brown: School Clothing Grants—That the Parliament notes the financial pressures on parents at the start of the school term; welcomes the contribution made by the school clothing grant to the budgets of parents on low incomes, and calls for the Scottish Executive to fund a substantial increase in the school clothing grant.

S3M-407 Robert Brown: School Clothing Grants—That the Parliament notes the financial pressures on parents at the start of the school term; welcomes the contribution made by the school clothing grant to the budgets of parents on low incomes, and calls for the Scottish Executive to fund a substantial increase in the school clothing grant. Supported by: Jackie Baillie*, Angela Constance*, Mike Pringle*, Jim Hume*, Jamie Stone*, Robin Harper*, Ross Finnie*
S3M-407 School Clothing Grants (lodged on 3 September 2007) Claire Baker* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
